title: New Garage Door Installation in DFW
intro:
* Complete Door Replacement  
* All-New Hardware Included   
* Style & Insulation Options  
* Professional Installation 

We install brand-new garage doors with all new tracks, hardware, springs, cables, and drums included—plus delivery, installation, and old door removal —so your new door looks great and works perfectly from day one.


A new garage door isn’t just a repair—it’s an upgrade to your home’s **appearance, security, and daily convenience**. Garage Cowboy provides **professional new garage door installation across the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex**, delivering doors that look better, operate smoother, and last longer.

Whether you’re replacing an aging door, boosting curb appeal before a sale, or installing a garage door on a new build, our certified local technicians guide you through the process and install your door **the right way**—so you don’t have to worry about callbacks, noise, or premature wear.

sections.title: Why Most Garage Door Installations Fail (And How We Do It Right)
sections.content:
Many garage door problems don’t start years later—they start on **installation day**.

Improper spring sizing, reused hardware, misaligned tracks, or rushed installs can lead to:

* Loud operation  
* Uneven movement  
* Premature spring or opener failure  
* Safety issues

At Garage Cowboy, we treat installation as a **full mechanical system**, not just hanging door panels. Every door is installed with correct balance, proper tension, and brand-new components designed specifically for your door’s size and weight.

sections.title: Garage Door Styles & Options We Install
sections.content:
We install a wide range of garage doors to match your home, usage, and budget:

* Steel, insulated, and non-insulated doors  
* Modern flush and contemporary designs  
* Traditional raised-panel doors  
* Carriage house–style garage doors  
* Custom sizes and configurations  
* Residential and commercial garage doors

If you’re unsure which door is right, we help you choose based on **insulation value, noise reduction, durability, and long-term performance**—not upsells.

sections.title: What’s Included With Your New Garage Door Installation
sections.content:
*(This Is Where We’re Different)*

When you choose Garage Cowboy, you’re not just buying a door—you’re getting a **complete, start-to-finish system replacement**.

### **Every New Garage Door Installation Includes:**

* **All-new vertical and horizontal tracks**  
* **All-new hardware** (hinges, brackets, rollers, fasteners)  
* **Properly matched springs** sized specifically for your door  
* **New cables and drums**  
* **Full system setup, balancing, and safety testing**  
* **Professional installation by certified technicians**

✔ **Delivery included**  
✔ **Removal and disposal of your old door included**  
✔ **No reused parts. No shortcuts. No surprises.**

*Garage door openers are not included with new door installations, but we’re happy to install or upgrade an opener separately if needed.*

sections.title: Professional Guidance — No Pressure, No Guesswork
sections.content:
Choosing a garage door can feel overwhelming. We simplify it.

We’ll walk you through:

* Insulation options for Texas heat  
* Door materials and durability  
* Noise reduction and smooth operation  
* Window layouts and hardware styles  
* Long-term maintenance considerations

You’ll get honest recommendations based on what actually makes sense for your home—not what costs the most.

sections.title: How the Process Works
sections.content:
**Step 1: Schedule an Appointment**  
Book online or call us. We’ll take precise measurements and help you select the right door. Many standard sizes are available for same- or next-day installation.

**Step 2: Choose Your Style & Features**  
We’ll review colors, materials, insulation, windows, and hardware options. Pricing is clear and transparent.

**Step 3: Installation Day**  
We remove your old door (if applicable), install your new system with precision, and test everything—balance, clearance, safety sensors, and overall operation.

**Enjoy the Upgrade**  
You’ll immediately notice the difference in looks, quietness, and smooth operation. We leave your garage clean and your new door fully tested and ready to perform.

sections.title: Why Homeowners Across DFW Choose Garage Cowboy
sections.content:
* Professional new garage door installation across DFW  
* Certified local technicians — not a franchise crew  
* Quality doors and hardware from trusted manufacturers  
* Custom solutions for homes and businesses  
* Transparent pricing with a Best Price Guarantee  
* After-hours service available at no additional charge

Garage Cowboy is a **locally owned, referral-based company** built on craftsmanship and accountability. If you’re not completely satisfied, we’ll come back and make it right.

sections.title: Serving Homes & Businesses Across DFW
sections.content: We install new garage doors for **residential and commercial properties** throughout Fort Worth, Arlington, Dallas, Keller, Mansfield, and surrounding DFW communities—from single-car garages to large commercial bays.

sections.title: Ready to Upgrade Your Garage Door?
sections.content:
If you’re investing in a new garage door, make sure it’s installed **correctly, completely, and professionally**.

Contact Garage Cowboy today to schedule your new garage door installation and see why so many homeowners across DFW trust us for their biggest garage upgrades.

faqs.question: What’s included with a new garage door installation from Garage Cowboy?
faqs.answer: Every installation includes new tracks, new hardware (hinges, brackets, rollers, fasteners), properly matched springs, new cables and drums, full balancing and safety testing, and professional installation. Delivery, removal of the old door, and disposal are included.

faqs.question: Does a new garage door installation include a new opener?
faqs.answer: No. Garage door openers are not included with new door installations. We can install or upgrade an opener separately if needed.

faqs.question: How do I know what size garage door I need?
faqs.answer: We take precise measurements during your appointment and confirm the correct size and configuration before ordering or installing.

faqs.question: Can you install insulated garage doors in DFW?
faqs.answer: Yes. We install insulated and non-insulated doors across the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex and can recommend the right insulation level for your needs.

faqs.question: How long does a new garage door installation take?
faqs.answer: Most standard replacements can be completed the same day. Timing depends on the door type, size, and site conditions, which we’ll confirm in advance.

faqs.question: Do you remove and haul away my old garage door?
faqs.answer: Yes. Removal and disposal of your old garage door are included.

faqs.question: What garage door styles do you install?
faqs.answer: We install modern flush, traditional raised-panel, carriage house–style doors, and custom sizes and configurations for residential and commercial properties.

faqs.question: Can you install a garage door on a new construction home?
faqs.answer: Yes. We install doors for new builds and ensure proper track setup, spring selection, balance, and safety testing from day one.

faqs.question: Will you test the door for safety after installation?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Every installation includes balance verification, smooth-travel testing, and a full safety check.

faqs.question: Do you serve Fort Worth and the surrounding DFW area?
faqs.answer: Yes. We provide new garage door installation throughout Fort Worth and the greater Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex, including Arlington, Dallas, Keller, Mansfield, and nearby areas.
